```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(GSEABaseReplacement)
```


```{r}
library("GSEABase")
a <- lapply(ls("package:GSEABase"), example, package = "GSEABase", character.only = TRUE, echo = FALSE, verbose = FALSE, ask = FALSE, give.lines = TRUE)

b <- a[lengths(a) != 0]
eval(parse(text = b[[1]]))
d <- lapply(b, function(x){!grepl("^#|^$", x)})
summary(unlist(d)) # Lines of code 1388
e <- lapply(seq_along(b), function(x){b[[x]][d[[x]]]})
```
